sql: SELECT cDelega, cCodArt, SUM( nTotal ) as [total], cNomArt FROM (

SELECT AlbCliL.cRef AS cCodArt, AlbCliL.cSufAlb AS cDelega, ( AlbCliL.nunicaja ) AS nTotal, AlbCliL.cDetalle AS cNomArt FROM {{empresa}}AlbCliL AS AlbCliL WHERE NOT AlbCliL.lFacturado AND NOT( AlbCliL.cRef = '' ) AND ( AlbCliL.dFecAlb >= {{dIniInf}} AND AlbCliL.dFecAlb <= {{dFinInf}} )

UNION SELECT FacCliL.cRef AS cCodArt, FacCliL.cSufFac AS cDelega, ( FacCliL.nunicaja ) AS nTotal, FacCliL.cDetalle AS cNomArt FROM {{empresa}}FacCliL AS FacCliL WHERE NOT ( FacCliL.cRef = '' ) AND ( FacCliL.dFecFac >= {{dIniInf}} AND FacCliL.dFecFac <= {{dFinInf}} )

UNION SELECT FacRecL.cRef AS cCodArt, FacRecL.cSufFac AS cDelega, ( FacRecL.nunicaja ) AS nTotal, FacRecL.cDetalle AS cNomArt FROM {{empresa}}FacRecL AS FacRecL WHERE NOT ( FacRecL.cRef = '' ) AND ( FacRecL.dFecFac >= {{dIniInf}} AND FacRecL.dFecFac <= {{dFinInf}} )

UNION SELECT TikeL.cCbaTil AS cCodArt, TikeL.cSufTil AS cDelega, ( TikeL.nUntTil ) AS nTotal, TikeL.cNomTil AS cNomArt FROM {{empresa}}TikeL AS TikeL WHERE NOT ( TikeL.cCbaTil = '' ) AND ( TikeL.dFecTik >= {{dIniInf}} AND TikeL.dFecTik <= {{dFinInf}} )
